data.title: Search Engine Optimization Services in Birmingham, AL
data.meta_description: Uptick Marketing delivers premier, industry-leading SEO services in Birmingham, AL. We are experts in technical, on-page, and off-page optimization.
data.text:
Not Showing Up on Google?

People are searching for what your business offers. Turn them into paying customers with a solid SEO strategy that delivers results.

If you feel like your business is struggling for visibility on Google, you’re not alone. Many business owners struggle to be found by the people who are searching for what they offer—and even if they get found, they aren’t always chosen. These days, it’s not enough to just show up higher in search (although that is a great start). Once you get in front of your audience in search results, you need them to choose you over your competition—and that’s where a professional SEO strategy really delivers value.

On-Going SEO

With an all-encompassing SEO strategy, we set your business up for success to achieve optimization goals that lead to conversions.

Learn More

Technical SEO

Our technical SEO audits and optimizations ensure your website looks good and performs optimally, earning the trust of users and search engines.

Learn More

Content Strategy

Content strategy tells your brand's story so it captivates and engages. This helps you succeed online and win brownie points with search engines.

Learn More

Local SEO

Our local SEO expertise ensures your business stands out in local searches, connecting you with customers in your backyard and beyond.

Learn More

Level Up Your SEO Game to Optimize Your Business Presence

At Uptick, it’s our business to help your business. We have a team of 35+ employees in-house, each specializing in a specific area of digital marketing. So all those things you’d like to do but don’t have the time to execute — we can take care of them for you.

Level 1

Technical SEO

This is the solid foundation that will support the rest of your SEO strategy. Your entire website will be audited for errors, bugs, and glitches, and we’ll make sure it’s properly set up for search engines to understand.

Level 2

Content Optimization

We’ll perform keyword research to determine the search terms your business should rank for, and then we’ll either optimize your existing content or create new optimized content from the ground up.

Level 3

User Accessibility

As we move into the user experience phase, we’ll be looking at factors like your website’s load speed, internal links, ease of interaction, and the time it takes a page to respond to a user’s input.

Level 4

Rankability

At this level, we’ll optimize the pages on your website to help you get chosen when you show up in search results. We’ll also boost your page’s authority by building links back to your site from other reputable sources.

Level 5

Clickability

With a heavy focus on Schema markup, this phase of the strategy focuses on providing more detailed information to searchers, including direct links to products or services, pricing info, event dates, and much more.

Get Your FREE SEO AUDIT Today!

Get Started

You’re Just 3 Steps Away From Search Engine Success

Schedule a Free Meeting

Fill out the form at the top of this page or click the “Get Started” button below, and a member of our team will get back to you as soon as possible. We’ll set up a time to meet with you, either in person or virtually, and hear about your business goals.

Review Your SEO Strategy

Our SEO team will evaluate your website and build a custom strategy designed to help you rank higher for the search terms that matter most for your business. We’ll walk you through our plan and answer any questions you have.

Get Found & Chosen in Search

Your business will gain visibility with the right audience by getting in front of them at the exact moment that they are searching for what you do. You’ll see increased traffic to your website from people who are ready to buy from someone like you!

Get Started

Proudly Located In Birmingham, AL

We create and execute custom SEO strategies for a variety of businesses locally, regionally, nationally, and globally. Reach out today, and let’s start a conversation.

Everyone at Uptick has just been fantastic to work with, and their results speak for themselves. Cannot recommend them highly enough.

I have been working with Alan, Monica, Manny, Luke, and others at Uptick for years and couldn’t be happier with the improvements in our marketing as well as the professionalism of everyone on the Uptick team. 10/10 recommend!!

Our partnership with Uptick has exceeded all our expectations. Everything they do is first-class, from communication to customer service to delivering a tailored marketing strategy with measurable results. It is clear they truly care about our business. Our consultant, Matt Spivak, is as knowledgeable, responsive, and kind as they come! We are very happy we made the decision to work with them.
